Message.Msg: tlt is no were near a bottom.
Cramer is a great entertainer. I rank him right up there with Milton Berle and Red Buttons. But as far as investment advice goes, almost any chimpanzee can do a better job.

Message.Title: Let's Ask Watson
Message.Msg: Let us ask Watson, IBM's all-knowing supercomputer , in a nationally televised public setting, what it thinks of current corporate management and its strategies, and whether based on a number of unbiased input matrices, Watson gives a figurative "thumbs-up" or "thumbs-down". Let the chips then publicly fall where they may . If a "thumbs-up, stay the course; if a "thumbs-down", then a broad clean sweep of Armonk e implemented. If IBM stands behind the brain power of Watson, let him be the arbiter.
